software.name: Seismic Line Mapper (SLM)
software.subtitle: A tool for enhanced delineation and attribution of linear disturbances in forests

collaborators.name: Gus Lopes Queiroz
collaborators.role: Lead Developer of SLM Alpha and Beta

software.description: SLM is a series of script tools for facilitating the high-resolution mapping and studying of seismic lines (petroleum exploration corridors in forested areas) via processing canopy height models (LiDAR or photogrammetry derived raster images where pixel-values represent the ground-height of vegetation).

software.name: Knickpoint Finder
software.subtitle: A software tool that improves neotectonic analysis
software.description: Software for morphometric analysis of drainage networks based on the methods of Hack (1973) and Etchebehere (2004). This tool is applicable to studies of morphotectonics and neotectonics. The software uses a digital elevation model (DEM) to identify the relief breakpoints along drainage profiles (knickpoints). It was coded in Python for use on the ArcGIS platform and is called Knickpoint Finder.

software.name: Claim & Suit Generator
software.subtitle: Standardized and rapid document generator
outputs: Standardized and formatted claim or suit
software.description: Online tool for rapid generation of standardized documents to be used by multiple personnel in a team. Upon submission of user friendly google forms outlining the main requirements for a particular claim or suit, this tool would generate the edited and formatted document and automatically e-mail it to the user.

software.name: Anadata
software.subtitle: Digital point-counter for petrological analysis
software.description: Software for counting minerals on images of petrographic thin sections obtained via image capture systems attached to microscopes. Eleven (11) ternary petrographic diagrams were attached to this software for facilitating rock classification and naming.

software.name: RF CWD
software.subtitle: Random forests (RF) classification of coarse woody debris (CWD) image-objects (segments of aerial images)
inputs: Comma-separated-values (CSV) table with the image-objects and their attributes
outputs: CSV tables with classification results and accuracy assessments
software.description: Divides an input table into training and testing datasets, trains a Random Forests (RF) machine learning classifier using the training dataset and applies it to the testing dataset, assessing the classification accuracy of CWD objects.

software.name: Gamedev twitter bot
software.subtitle: Twitter bot for enhanced gamedev marketing strategies
inputs: List of relevant gamedev twitter accounts and relevant hashtags
software.description: Automatically follows followers of relevant accounts based on some account activity criteria and usage of hashtags, likes their posts, and unfollows inactive accounts. Gathered an all-time high of 5000 followers over a 5 month period, after which it was deactivated.

software.name: DataMine CSV validator
software.subtitle: Spreadsheet validator for enhanced drill core database maintenance
inputs: Comma-separated-values (CSV) database of drill core information
outputs: Corrected CSV with flagged problematic rows
software.description: Detects typos and problems within a database based on certain criteria, corrects some of them automatically and flags the others for manual inspection.

software.name: Azimuth Finder
software.subtitle: A software for data reading in structural geology
outputs: File for use in rose diagram software
software.description: Measures geomorphological lineaments and outputs tables for confection of rose diagrams. The tool is capable of performing a weighted analysis based on lineament length.

software.name: Geomorphological units
software.subtitle: Terrain rugosity classification
software.description: Measures a terrain rugosity index and uses it to classify the terrain into different geomorphological units.

software.name: Watershed Asymmetry
software.subtitle: Geomorphological analysis applied to neotectonics
software.description: Finds the longest drainage within a watershed and uses it to divide the basin, which then provides an asymmetry index.
